英文公告.附加說明: Contract Performance and working items:1.The procuring types of dispenser include the submersible electronic dispenser and suction electronic dispenser (including installation). The amount of each type:(1)Suction dispenser: Single diesel product dispenser with 2-nozzle – 15 sets ,Two kinds of gasoline/diesel products dispenser with 4-nozzle – 2 sets ,Two kinds of gasoline products dispenser with 4-nozzle – 9 sets ,Three kinds of gasoline/diesel products dispenser with 6-nozzle – 5 sets ,Three kinds of gasoline products dispenser with 6-nozzle – 20 sets(2)Submersible electronic dispenser:Single diesel product dispenser with 2-nozzle – 4 sets ,Single gasoline product dispenser with 2-nozzle –2 sets ,Two kinds of gasoline products dispenser with 4-nozzle – 2 sets ,Three kinds of gasoline/diesel products dispenser with 6-nozzle – 3 sets ,Three kinds of gasoline products dispenser with 6-nozzle – 3 sets(3)The vapor recovery system – 46 sets2.Working Items: The winning bidder shall provide five-year warranty and guarantee of maintenance and repairs (including repair, labor, material, test, and consumable accessories renewing) after acceptance.3.Payment: According to the awarded contract, Article 5 in Gasoline Dispenser Procurement of 2012.
